content: The most galling part of all of this was Republicans signing on AFTER the Gorsuch vote to “preserve the filibuster”. What would make anyone think they’ll keep a promise now that they directly spat in the face of the filibuster to push through a partisan hack? Any Democrat who signed the same document as those snakes should be ashamed. There is no return to bipartisanship now. Just a legislative war on the fascist thugs attempting to usurp our democracy.
